Styleguide

  • Layout Elements
  • Typography
  • Media Elements
  • Form Inputs

Layout Elements #

Grid Row

A flow layout row

Default styling
show/hide markup 
<div class="grid-row"></div>

Grid Cell

A flow layout cell

Default styling
show/hide markup 
<div class="grid-row"><div class="grid-cell"></div></div>

Typography #

First-level Headline

A standard first-level headline. The most important headline for a section.

Default styling

This is a first level headline.
show/hide markup 
<h1>This is a first level headline.</h1>

Media Elements #

Image

A basic image.

Default styling
show/hide markup 
<img src="" alt="An image." />

Form Inputs #

Text Input

A basic text input.

Default styling
:hover

Subtle hover highlight.
:focus

Subtle focus highlight and dark border.
.invalid

Invalid input detected.
show/hide markup 
<input type="text" class="{{modifier_class}}" />

Email Input

An email-specific text input.

Default styling
:hover

Subtle hover highlight.
:focus

Subtle focus highlight and dark border.
.invalid

Invalid input detected.
show/hide markup 
<input type="email" class="{{modifier_class}}" />

Search Input

A search-specific text input.

Default styling
:hover

Subtle hover highlight.
:focus

Subtle focus highlight and dark border.
.invalid

Invalid input detected.
show/hide markup 
<input type="search" class="{{modifier_class}}" />
